attributes.action: revaluate the proposed contract of the Camden Road Surgery, the Brunswick Centre and the King's Cross Road Practice to a large foreign company.  We want our GPs to stay local.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "revaluate the proposed contract of the Camden Road Surgery, the Brunswick Centre and the King's Cross Road Practice to a large foreign company. We want our GPs to stay local."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15500.asp

Prime Minister's Office
